text.more:
We select 170 virus that cause diseases in humans, and retrieve all PMIDs related to them using Taxonomy ID tool from NCBI. Data were downloaded in october, 2020.
Pubtator Central and our own scripts were used to identify the potential relationships (edges) between human genes and virus (nodes).
We excluded all types of reviews, letters and editorials articles and selected only associations supported by two or more documents. Biological concepts were annotated using MeSH descriptors. 
We performed a modular analysis using the community detection algorithm implemented within Gephi software. Modules are denoted by node color.
text.intro:
Pubtator Central and our own scripts were used to identify the potential relationships (edges) between genes and virus (nodes).
We performed a modular analysis using the community detection algorithm implemented within Gephi software. 

Virus: 77 different species that cause disease in humans
Genes: 1210 human genes
Edges: 5475 associations supported by 2 or more documents
Node size represents degree
Modules are denoted by node color
Undirected graph
text.title: Virus x Genes Knowledge Network
